landing_page.hero: Full screen video/image background with heavy bottom fade. Text bottom-left aligned. Massive 'Syne' typography.
landing_page.gallery: Masonry/Bento grid. Asymmetric columns. Images reveal artist name on hover.
landing_page.booking_cta: Sticky bottom bar on mobile, or floating glass card on desktop.

booking_flow.structure: Multi-step wizard. Step 1: Service (Big Cards). Step 2: Artist (Avatars). Step 3: Calendar (Custom Shadcn). Step 4: Form.
booking_flow.vibe: Clinical but dark. High contrast for readability.

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. FONTS: Add the Google Fonts imports to 'index.css' at the very top.
3. THEME: Force Dark Mode. Add 'dark' class to the html or body tag permanently. Do not create a toggle.
4. LAYOUT: The 'Booking System' is the core product. It must be accessible from the Hero CTA.
5. ANIMATION: Use 'framer-motion' for page transitions and scroll reveals. Elements should 'fade up' with a slight delay.
6. BOOKING LOGIC: Mock the backend calls for now, but build the UI to handle: Service Selection -> Artist Selection -> Date/Time -> User Details.
7. CRITICAL: Do not use default Shadcn cards. Remove shadows, add 1px white/10 borders, make backgrounds transparent or black.
8. IMAGES: Use the provided URLs. Do not use placeholders.
9. TESTIDS: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, cards).
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': No generic centered text, no purple/teal gradients.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors.
